EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-11-09
EmailTemplate.subject: The Learning Never Stops at Liberty Mutual
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 09, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-learning-never-stops-at-liberty-mutual-453a1bbeb70?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Learning Never Stops at Liberty Mutual The century-old insurance company puts customer feedback at the center of software development. Check It Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-learning-never-stops-at-liberty-mutual-453a1bbeb70?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/design-led-solutions-for-humanitarian-aid-5303b1c46f70?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Design-led Solutions for Humanitarian Aid How Pivotal worked with the Humanitarian Innovation Fund to develop a guide for applying lean and user-centered design far beyond software. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/design-led-solutions-for-humanitarian-aid-5303b1c46f70?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/lessons-learned-running-our-first-remote-design-sprint-5e980abda68b?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Lessons Learned Running Our First Remote Design Sprint Hadrien Raffali and Canyon Boak explain the key takeaways they had from implementing a Google Ventures Sprint process with a remote design team. Read More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/lessons-learned-running-our-first-remote-design-sprint-5e980abda68b?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/looking-into-the-future-from-microservices-to-service-blocks-ep-49?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Looking Into the Future: From Microservices to Service Blocks (Ep. 49) Kenny Bastani joins Jeff and Dormain to discuss service blocks, how he came up with the concept, and what it might mean for future serverless architecture. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/looking-into-the-future-from-microservices-to-service-blocks-ep-49?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/blog/so-you-want-to-be-a-product-manager]]> So You Want to Be a Product Manager, But Don't Know Where to Start Kate Griggs explains how to begin a career as a product manager. Become a PM <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/blog/so-you-want-to-be-a-product-manager]]> <[[https://medium.com/@cote/limit-upfront-analysis-by-including-frequent-real-world-feedback-from-users-7e99ad01c8b2]]> Limit Upfront Analysis by Including Frequent, Real-world Feedback from Users Coté explains why it's important to slim down your upfront thinking. Make Better Software <[[https://medium.com/@cote/limit-upfront-analysis-by-including-frequent-real-world-feedback-from-users-7e99ad01c8b2]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/agile?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Agile: The Way to Develop Great Software Learn how agile development practices let companies experience the power of rallying entire teams behind a defined process that embraces inclusivity and drives productivity. Why Agile Matters <[[https://pivotal.io/agile?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 11/14 Cloud-Native Meetup: Cloud-Native Security, Dallas <[[https://www.meetup.com/Dallas-Cloud-Native-Meetup/events/242898072/]]>
